org.crosswire.jsword.book
接口 BookList

所有已知子接口：
Installer
所有已知实现类：
AbstractBookList, AbstractSwordInstaller, Books, HttpSwordInstaller
public interface BookList

There are several lists of Books, the most important being the installed Books, however there may be others like the available books or books from a specific driver. This interface provides a common method of accessing all of them.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., License

方法摘要
 void addBooksListener(BooksListener li)
          Remove a BibleListener from our list of listeners
 java.util.List<Book> getBooks()
          Get a list of all the Books of all types.
 java.util.List<Book> getBooks(BookFilter filter)
          Get a filtered list of all the Books.
 void removeBooksListener(BooksListener li)
          Add a BibleListener to our list of listeners
